IceStormArena-AggroTill75-FarmTill100-Fa.description: If below level 75, goes to cell r4 of IceStormArena and provokes monsters in cell r3c to farm XP until level 75; make sure to join a public IceStormArena with some level 75+ players. If above level 75, goes to r3c and farms monsters directly for XP, Gold, and Class Points in all classes listed in the "public string[] RankUpClasses = { }" array. Feel free to add Treasure Chests to the "public string[] RequiredItems = { }" array if you would like the script to pick them up, and your desired equipment to the "public string[] EquippedItems = { }" array if you want the bot to equip that gear before farming. Have fun!

BloodMoonTokens-VampireLord.cs.description: Farms 300 Blood Moon Tokens required for the Vampire Lord Class.

ChaosMilitiaREP.cs.description: Farms Chaos Militia Reputation up until Rank 10.

ArcangroveREP.cs.description: Farms Arcangrove Reputation up until Rank 10.

HollowbornREP.cs.description: Farms Hollowborn Reputation up until Rank 10.

Dreadrock-LegionTokens.cs.description: Farms your desired quantity of Legion Tokens through the Undead Champion Recruitment Quest in /dreadrock, defaults to max (25,000).

NecroticSword_SmartVoidAuras_UsesBothMet.description: Farms you 7500 Void Auras through Commanding Shadow Essences if you have Sepulchure's DoomKnight Armor, or through Retrieve the Void Auras if you don't. You can edit the RVAQuantity int's value to however many quantities of each item you want to farm per batch of RVA turnins (min = 20, max = 100).

IceStormArena_Aggromon_FastXP.cs.description: Goes to cell r4 of IceStormArena and provokes monsters in cell r3c to farm XP until Level 100; make sure to join a public IceStormArena with some level 75+ players.

TimeForSomeSpringCleaning-LegionTokens.c.description: Farms your desired quantity of Legion Tokens through the Time for Some Spring Cleaning Quest from whichever out of the Shogun Paragon Clones you own, defaults to max (25,000). Accepted Pets: Paragon Fiend Quest Pet, Paragon Ringbearer, Shogun Paragon Pet, Shogun Dage Pet. You can change the amount of Legion Tokens farmed by editing the "public int LegionTokenQuantity" and the amount of each reagent farmed before bulk turning in by editing the "int TurnInQuantity".

SoulSearching-SpiritOrbs-BLoD-Part1.cs.description: Farms you 10500 Spirit Orbs through the Soul Searching Quest.

APennyForYourFoughts-DarkSpiritOrbs-SDKA.description: Farms you 10500 Dark Spirit Orbs through the A Penny For Your Foughts Quest.

Hollowborn-ShadowReapers-Scythe.cs.description: Farms you the Hollowborn ShadowReaper's Scythe. You may buy back the Incarnation of Glitches Scythe if you can.

NNg_Ancient_Astrolabe_and_ancient_hourgl.description: This bot will grind for Ancient Astrolabe and Ancient Hourglass with customisable quantity set, toggle buttons and all Lightning set drops in order to merge (REQUIREMENTS: MUST FINISH ORBHUNT IADOA'S QUESTLINE IN ORDER TO LAUNCH THE SCRIPT)

NationRecruits-EmblemsOfNulgath.cs.description: Farms your desired quantity of Emblems of Nulgath. You can edit the quantity by editing the public int EmblemQuantity at the top of the bot.

NWNO_Combo_NulgathReagents.cs.description: Gets you your desired quantity of each Nulgath Reagent from the New Worlds, New Opportunities quest, except Tainted Gems which are instead farmed from Swindle's Bulk. Will turn in Voucher Item: Totem of Nulgath if the requirements are met for higher Gem/Totem gains. Required Pets: Nulgath's Birthday Gift OR Bounty Hunter's Drone Pet.

KissTheVoid-BloodGems.cs.description: Farms you Blood Gems of the Archfiend through Kiss the Void. Must have unlocked cell r17 of /blindingsnow by completing the /northlands storyline. Will turn in 50x Uni 10 at Swindle's Ripoff Emporium if you have 900k Gold for extra Blood Gems, and also Voucher Item: Totem of Nulgath if possible for passive Gems and Totems of Nulgath.

VoidHighLord-RoentgeniumOfNulgath.cs.description: Farms the Void Highlord's Challenge quest as many times as is possible on the given day (your current amount of Elders' Blood + 1), and farms all the requirements for the next day.

YokaiREP.cs.description: Farms Yokai Rep up until Rank 10. Please finish the /yokaiboat and /dragonkoi stories or I will ban your ass from the discord server.

Purple-ChaosAvengerQuest-Requirements.cs.description: Farms all required items for chaos avenger quest.

BrightoakREP.cs.description: Farms Brightoak Reputation up until Rank 10.

BludrutBrawl_CombatTrophies.cs.description: Farms your desired quantity of Combat Trophies.

Combat_Trophies.cs.description: Farms your desired quantity of Combat Trophies.

Purple-Chaos-Rep.cs.description: Does embrace your chaos quest until you're rank 10 Chaos

Purple-Lycan-Rep.cs.description: Does "sanguine" quest until you're rank 10 Lycan

Bloom_EvilReputation.cs.description: Farms in youthanize. Same shit as always

AutoAttack.cs.description: Auto attack any monster in the room until you stop the bot

Black_Friday_All_Items.cs.description: Farms & banks all free AC + Seasonal items of the Black Friday event. Made for 2021

Super-Fan_Swag_Token_A.cs.description: Farms the For Science quest to obtain Super Fan Swag Tokens for Rep.

Frostval_Helsgrove.cs.description: Farms all bossdrops and merge items in the Helsgrove map, part of the Frostval event.

Smart_Legion_Tokens.cs.description: Farms your desired quantity of Legion Tokens through Bright Paragon, Shogun Paragon (or its variants), or Dreadrock, based on whichever you have access to. Legion Arena is garbage so I don't use that.

Hollowborn_DoomKnight.cs.description: Does the entire A Dark Knight questline to obtain the Hollowborn Sword of Doom and more.

Smart_Attack_Hunt.cs.description: This bot has two modes: Select a monster before running the bot and it will hunt any monster by that name across the entire map. If you don't select anything before hand, it will farm the current cell. This bot will also automatically turn in any quests if there is a quest ready for turn

Fishing_Rep.cs.description: Completes "Favor for Faith" to get Dynamite x10, then fishes with the %Dynamite%30% packet... which can be used at Rank 1 fishing.

Bloom_LegionRevenant_Full_v.1.4_BETA.cs.description: Completes entire legion revenant farm from A to Z but excluding the storyline reqs.

BloomJex_Army_AC_StatusCheck.cs.description: Let's you input multiple army account then the bot login all of those each to check the AC amount. Check results in the Script tab of the Logs Window.

FireAvatarsFavor.cs.description: Farms Fire Avatar's Favor for the Fire Avatar Merge

Smart_All_Dailies_Bot.cs.description: Smart All Dailies bot. This bot will do all important dailies AQW has to offer (except ultra bosses). It will automatically check if you own something yet, and if you do it will skip that.
